children.value: version 0.23.0! In this release, we are excited to announce the open beta of Liquidity Mining, a new connector, easier to use pure market-making strategy, and addressed a number of bugs.

. We will work hard to collect user feedback and fix bugs to provide a great user experience when we go live on March 2, 2020.

Pure market-making now has a basic/advanced split that will only prompt during the configuration of the basic parameters such as the exchange name, trading pair, bid/ask spreads, cancel order wait time, and order amount.
Users can configure the advanced features of this strategy by entering
command in Hummingbot, or by editing the strategy config file.

Here we list other recent significant changes to Hummingbot docs:

Updated quickstart guide and added GIF images for visual.

Added information in Binance troubleshooting about Binance HTTP return codes 429 and 418, Binance API trading limits, and how to avoid these return codes when running Hummingbot.
